variable.name: of_fxdt_imp
variable.description: Date of fracture imputed (for both hip and non-hip fractures)?

variable.name: of_imp_type
variable.description: Which components of the date of fracture are imputed (for hip and non-hip fractures)?
variable.value: Fracture date NOT imputed because month, day and year were available.
DAY of fracture imputed because day missing: 15 was assigned in cases like this
MONTH of fracture imputed because month missing: 6 was assigned in cases like this
DAY and MONTH of fracture imputed because both were missing
DAY, MONTH, and YEAR of fracture imputed because all were missing: date was obtained from an x-ray report of an old fracture
DAY, MONTH, and YEAR of fracture imputed because all were missing: date was obtained from a note in the medical history taken by nurse/MD in participant's medical records

variable.name: of_fxsite
variable.description: Fracture location (for both hip and non-hip fractures).
variable.comment: Hip and non-hip fractures were initially categorized into 60 detailed skeletal sites (see back of annotated form), but then collapsed into 21 locations for ease of analysis.
variable.value: All wrist and forearm fractures: includes wrist (unspecified), distal radius (Colles';Smith), distal ulna, both distal radius and ulna, other small bones in wrist and radius a/o ulna, proximal or mid shaft
Facial bones: includes jaw, nose, cheek
Upper arm: includes arm (unspecified), and humerus (upper arm)

All vertebrae: includes neck, first-seventh cervical vertebra, multiple cervical vertebra, thoracic spine (unspecified), first-twelfth thoracic spine vertebra, multiple thoracic spine vertebra lumbar spine (unspecified), first-fifth lumbar vertebra, multiple lumbar vertebra, and spine (unspecified)
Leg: includes leg (unspecified), femur (not hip), tibia, fibula, both tibia/fibula
Foot/metatarsal: includes foot/metatarsal and heel/os calcis

variable.name: of_fxside
variable.description: Fracture side (for both hip fractures and non-hip fractures).
variable.value: Axial (vertebral, pelvis, nasal, sacrum, sternum, skull)

variable.name: of_fxcircum
variable.description: Detailed circumstances of fracture (for both hip and non-hip fractures).
variable.value: Fall from standing height or less - includes most injuries due to tripping over something, slips in shower or tub, falling out of chair or bed, pt lands on the surface at the same height as the surface he/she was standing on
Falls on stairs, steps or curbs - includes all falls during change in level, such as stepping up or down stairs, steps, curbs.
Fall from more than standing height, but NOT on stairs - includes falls from heights such as off a ladder or while standing on a table or chair, off a porch, out of a window, etc.
Minimal trauma other than a fall - includes vertebral fractures associated with coughing, stepping down a step, etc, and rib or other fractures associated with turning over in bed, etc.

Moderate trauma other than a fall - includes collisions with objects during normal activities (stub toe, hit hand against door frame, walking into door), twisting or turning ankle (or ankle fractures).
Severe trauma other than a fall - includes motor vehicle accidents, struck by a car, hit by rapidly moving projectile (golf ball, golf club), assault.
Pathologic fracture - usually associated with cancer in bone.

variable.name: of_cnfrmfx
variable.description: Fracture confirmed by medical record (for both hip and non-hip fractures)?

variable.name: of_fxdate
variable.description: Date fracture occurred (for both hip and non-hip fractures)
variable.comment: Number of days since Exam 1 Negative numbers indicate fractures that occurred before exam 1 date.
